item.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18731)
item.content:encoded:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

pauder

item.title: Parasol Patrol is honored to be supporting the student created...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Parasol Patrol is honored to be supporting the student created and led Justice for Duante Wright and other Victims Solitarity March at the Colorado State Capitol, 200 E Colfax, Denver, CO 80203. Please come and stand between potential protesters and these kids as shield against hatred.

We will be hosting a sign making table as well. Traffic control as well as remaining around the perimeter of the Rally and March. We really need your help.

So grab your umbrellas, if you happ...en to have extra water, ice, snacks,... etc. handy. Please dress appropriately for the weather. Understandably, emotions will run high here. Remember that we don't engage with protesters even when we feel strongly to do so.

Ashira C. is a vibrant, young, black teen organizing this event. Thank you all for supporting them and othe young people with a heart and passion to lead their community.

See More

SAT, APR 17 AT 11:30 AM MDT

ParasolPatrol Shields BIPOC/Youth Led "Duante Wright & Other Victims Solidarity March"

Colorado State Capitol

· DenverCauses · 112 people
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: “You know, sometimes when Black women gather, exciting things...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“You know, sometimes when Black women gather, exciting things happen, and I think this is one of those examples. It’s probably not a surprise to say that Black women have been leaders in the survivor justice movement over the decades, but we’re acutely aware that our stories are very rarely told, and when they are told, they aren’t given the dignity and respect they deserve. This initiative really grew out of conversations with Black survivors, some who are household names and some who people probably don't know but who want to change the conversation and culture and ways in which Black survivors are received.” -Fatima Goss Graves
#SAAM #SAAM2021 #BelieveBlackWomen #PROTECTBLACKWOMENATALLCOSTS

An interview with the women behind We, As Ourselves.

glamour.com

The New Initiative Uplifting the Stories of Black Survivors of Sexual Violence

An interview with the women behind We, As Ourselves.An interview with the women behind We, As Ourselves.

item.title: #BlackHealingIsRevolutionary
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#BlackHealingIsRevolutionary

QuiAnna Ray

Dear Black People,
Please take care of yourself.
Turn off the news if you need to.
Log off social media if you got to.
Ask for help if you need it. ...
Cry if you have too.
Do whatever you need to do.
Honor your grief.
Honor your pain.
Honor your healing.
Please take care of your heart.
Please take care of your spirit.
Please take care.
Please take care.
I love you.
I live you.

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Holistic Heaux is in Minneapolis, Minnesota.We are collecting community support for the mother of Daunte's son. She...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Holistic Heaux is in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

We are collecting community support for the mother of Daunte's son. She has personally requested this help and we are here to amplify her needs. Please share an...d spread the word for those who want to help. May Daunte Rest In Love. Let's come together to help who he's left behind. 🧡

Image description:

How to Support Daunte Wright's Son and Girlfriend

Daunte Wright was murdered by Brooklyn Center Police on 4/11. He leaves behind the mother of his child, Chyna, and his soon to be 2 year-old-son, Daunte Jr.

Holistic Heaux has been in contact with Daunte Wrights' girlfriend. We are rallying support for her and their son.

Items:
Diaper
Size 4
18-24 Month clothes
Shoes size 6
Groceries
Gift cards

Monetary donations:
Cash App: $hubby98 (Chyna's direct Cash App)
Venmo: @thuy-jones (Will pass to Chyna)
PayPal: @holisticheaux (Will pass to Chyna)

Drop-Off Location
Please message @HolisticHeaux for address on facebook or instagram

See More

item.title: “Daunte was tragically shot and killed by Minneapolis police...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

“Daunte was tragically shot and killed by Minneapolis police today on a traffic stop .I am Dauntes aunt Kelly I set up this page to take the burden off my sister Katie Wright and brother in law Aubrey Wright as they are grieving the loss of there 20 year old son..Please donate to give Daunte the proper burial he deserves and if you can't help please send lots of prayers for our family to get through this tragic loss thank you and God bless”

#JusticeForDaunteWright #SayHisName #BlackLivesMatter #MutualAid #DaunteWright

https://www.gofundme.com/f/dauntes-funeral-and-burial-cost

Daunte was tragically shot and killed by Minneapolis police today on a traffic stop .I am… Kelly Bryant needs your support for Dauntes Funeral and Burial cost

item.title: Say his name. #DaunteWright Rest in power. You were so...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Say his name. #DaunteWright

Rest in power.

You were so young.

...

You had so much life left to live.

Your son had countless memories left to make with you.

Peace and comfort to your family.

#NoJusticeNoPeace

See MoreJane Simons

Today 💔💔💔
Another senseless murder by police..
In Minnesota..
and another child without a father

...

during the Chauvin trial no less
When will it stop. 🥺🥵

“This is #DaunteWright and his son Daunte Wright Jr.

Earlier today Daunte Sr. was shot to death during a traffic stop reportedly about an air freshener obstructing a mirror.

He was 20 years old and killed by a Brooklyn Center Police Officer in MN. He was unarmed.”
They left him in the street for 6-8 hours
#BlackLivesMatter #DaunteWright #SayHisName

item.title: #SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #ProtectBlackWomenAtAllCosts

Black Women's Blueprint

In recognition of Black Maternal Health Week and Sexual Assault Awareness Month, join us this coming Monday for an important webinar. We will provide insights a...bout how rape culture shows up in our programs and institutions, hindering women's access to trauma-informed services and reproductive health care and the correlation to maternal mortality. We will lay out a framework, model and tools developed by Black Women's Blueprint for public health, medical professionals, reproductive justice and sexual assault prevention advocates to radically shift the current paradigms.
Link in BWB's bio to register.
*
*
*
#SAAM21 #endsexualassault #blackmaternalhealth #reproductivejustice #BMHW21 #blackmamasmatter

item.title: #SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #BelieveWomen
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#SAAM2021 #BLM5280SAAM #BelieveBlackWomen #BelieveWomen

Morgan Rene'e

Dear Survivor, 💙

NEVER forget how strong you are.
Remember you did EVERYTHING you could to survive that moment.🤞🏾

...

It’s ok if you’re angry, it’s ok if it happened a long time ago and it’s ok if you don’t know if you’ll ever “be over it.”⏳

Remember, It is NOT your fault. You ARE strong. You ARE worthy of love. You ARE BELIEVED. What doesn’t kill you makes you stronger. 📶

I love you, I believe you, I support you and you are not alone. 💕

With Love,
Another Survivor 🦋

#SexualAssultAwarenessMonth #SAAM #WomenEmpowerment #MenToo #MeTooMovement #NoMeansNo #ConsentIsSexy #SupportSurvivors #BelieveSurvivors

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...
